name: Antonio Florido
text:
Hi, this is a super nice approach to silverlight using python.
I got this error when i run it 

Unhandled Error in Silverlight 2 Application Code: 2104 Category: InitializeError Message: 2104 Error.

By the way, have you try to develop ironpython with vstudio2008 and silverlight?


Regards!

name: Bekim Bacaj
text:
Well, you should try it on IE9 or 10 or any other older version for that matter.
The sequence finishes in less than 3 seconds and CPU load is lower tan 13% here.

You must be using some netsacape breed again after 15 years...

name: Tarn Barford
text:
Yeah, it is not exactly an efficient algorithm, nor language for implementing it, nor implementation of it.

It is a little surprising to me that I could get a 28Mhz 80386 to do faster 15 years ago than I can on a web page today.

name: Tarn Barford
Matt
text:
Thanks for the article. I found I had to run:

    gem install ohai -v 7.4.0 

In order to get pleaserun to work correctly.

name: Ciges
text:
Thanks you very much for this clean tutorial.

I get borrowed from you the diagram to illustrate a presentation I am doing on Map-Reduce over MongoDB.

Regards and good work!
